channel.title: Project ANEURYSM© - Need Tutorials, Help & Suggestions -
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i172.photobucket.com/albums/w40/Project_ANEURYSM/ANEURYSM.png[/img] [size=15pt][i]Zenzie will be helping me do the coding and CrushMe will be making forums We do not need any coders or anything right now please dont ask[/i][/size][/center]
Ok I've been playing this awesome server for a week or so now all the veteran players want it to go back to V1 of the game because people are duping phats pking out of wildy ect. Now everyones chars are being deleted I was lvl120. One of the higher lvls of the server lvling is pretty slow its alright on npcs per 1 you hit you get 1k xp. V1 of the server is harder so everyone except a bunch of the first players getting reset im really pissed off because of this ofcourse and am quitting my work being trashed... Then I had a brilliant idea i would make my own server in an origanal place never done before make lvling quite hard, make phats expensive, make money quite hard to get, add as many skills as posible now I want to make a really origanal server nothing like any other. People As of now im starting "Project ANEURYSM©" I will need support, suggestions, help and tutorials.
Current Suggestions: [quote="nacho.man.mikesta"]Here's the list of suggestions we made. ;)
- Get a no-ip domain. - Lower white armour bonuses. [s]- Make claws as shield.[/s] - Make White Knight area. - Make defence bonuses work. - Level 126 Combat with [s]Level 99 stats max.[/s] [s]- Make Membership.[/s] :P - Glory and Duel Ring teleports you to the tower. - Smithing and Proper levels. [s]- Make char window appear at first login.[/s] - Make ::starter command, it can give around 200k. [s]- Disable Mass Clicking.[/s] - Clan List. - Explosion Skill :D - Add normal magic spells. - Convert symbols (eg. !@#$%^&*) to _'s. - Stat Menus. [s]- Bones to Bananas converts Bars to Ores.[/s] - Recipe for Disaster Glove Requirements. [s]- Make Nationvoice forums.[/s] :D - Make custom PK area. - Proper King Black Dragon lair. - Portal room. ;)[/quote] ^^^List that me and Nacho made^^^
I currently Need Help with: -The Non crossed out things in the Quote
The list of people who support me on this project: - XmoparscapeX - SeySayux - Nacho.Man.Mikesta - Slivion - Zenzie - CrushMe - Lasermouse0 - ZeroFreeze ;) - Ollie123 - Jonaske - Cabby - Bluurr -
List of Tutorials/Things Completed for the Project: - Fixing Def bonuses (got 2 errors I'll fix) [so I removed will fix/add later] - Added 100% Full Range (except c bow not working I'll fix it) [range is now allowed and not over powered] - Fixed the Hair Sticking out of Helms Glitch - Changed start point - Changed all the tele locations - Changed rare prices - Adding my own emotes (like push ups ect.) [about 1/4 done] - Much more.
List of People who have Helped me: - Crush - making [url=http://projectaneurysm.co.nr/index.php]Sexy Forums! - Made to co.nr by me![/url] - Zenzie - Coding help! - zammy!! - how to disable mass - ZeroFreeze - Very good Command -
I hope this will be the best server ever created I have quite alot of time on my hands and want to make the best server ever.
~Nirvana~

item.title: Project ANEURYSM© - Need Tutorials, Help & Suggestions -
item.dc:creator: @tythus tythus
item.description:
@tythus wrote:

members
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Your Command Here”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerIsMember > 1)) {
If You Want Admins Or Mods To Beable To use It just Add In The Player Rights…
How To Make Admins Give Players Member Ship

else if (command.startsWith(“membership”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
String victim = command.substring(7);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully got membership settings”);
BufferedWriter bw = null;
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“data/membership.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+“gave”+victim+“membership”);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
}
catch(IOException ioexception) {
misc.println(“membership.txt: error loading file.”);
}
}

And The Checking Mechanism
public int checkmembership()
{
try
{
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./data/membership.txt"));
String data = null;
while ((data = in.readLine()) != null)
{
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(data))
{
return 5;
}
}
}
catch (IOException e)
{
System.out.println(“Critical error while checking membership accounts.!”);
e.printStackTrace();
}
return 0;
}

Open data folder (if you dont have make it)
Add a new .txt file named “membership”
Or Change Where You Want It To Be Placed…

I Hope this Helped,

Tythus

Read full topic

item.title: Project ANEURYSM© - Need Tutorials, Help & Suggestions -
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

[quote=“Cabby, post:42, topic:72560”]Maybe you could do the commands for ::goup and ::godown like
Go Up

[code]if (command.startsWith(“goup1”) && (playerRights == 0))
{
heightLevel = 1;
}

if (command.startsWith(“goup2”) && (playerRights == 0))
{
heightLevel = 2;
}

if (command.startsWith(“goup3”) && (playerRights == 0))
{
heightLevel = 3;
}
[/code]
And the other
Go Down

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“godown0”) && (playerRights == 0))
{
heightLevel = 0;
}

if (command.startsWith(“godown1”) && (playerRights == 0))
{
heightLevel = 0;
}

if (command.startsWith(“godown2”) && (playerRights == 0))
{
heightLevel = 2;
} [/code]
I think you get the idea.[/quote]

I Think This Is The Best

Read full topic

item.title: Project ANEURYSM© - Need Tutorials, Help & Suggestions -
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

I’m supporting this, and heres a simple goup/down command:

if (command.startsWith("goup")) { teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; heightLevel += 1; } else if (command.startsWith("godown")) { teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; heightLevel -= 1; }

Read full topic
